item.title: Lokalguiden Admin Interface Redesign
item.description:
Challenge

Lokalguiden’s admin interface had evolved organically over years, resulting in inconsistent UI patterns, confusing navigation, and inefficient workflows. Internal teams struggled with daily tasks, leading to decreased productivity and increased training time for new staff.

Key Problems:

  • Inconsistent interface patterns and navigation
  • Poor information architecture making features hard to find
  • Outdated visual design reducing usability
  • No design system leading to fragmented experience

Approach

Research & Discovery

  • Conducted user interviews with internal staff across departments
  • Mapped common workflows and pain points
  • Audited existing interface for usability issues
  • Analyzed task completion times and error rates

Information Architecture

item.title: Fastighetsgalan Brand Identity & Website
item.description:
Challenge

Lokalguiden needed to launch Fastighetsgalan, an awards event targeting the real estate industry. The sub-brand required its own distinct identity while maintaining connection to the Lokalguiden parent brand. The project needed both visual identity and a functional event website.

Approach

Brand Strategy

  • Positioned Fastighetsgalan as prestigious and professional
  • Created visual identity that feels elevated while relating to Lokalguiden
  • Developed brand guidelines for consistent event materials

Website Design

  • Designed clean, professional website showcasing event information
  • Created clear user flows for nominations and registrations
  • Ensured mobile-responsive design for accessibility

Solution

  • Distinct brand identity that stands independently while complementing Lokalguiden
  • Professional event website with clear information architecture
  • Cohesive visual system applicable across digital and print materials
  • Registration/nomination flows designed for user ease

Impact

  • Successfully launched new event brand in competitive market
  • Professional presentation attracted high-quality participants
  • Website served as effective information hub and registration platform
  • Visual identity enhanced perceived value of awards

Role

Art Director – Created brand identity from concept to completion, designed and implemented website, established visual guidelines.

item.title: Lokalguiden Brand Refresh 2020
item.description:
Challenge

As Lokalguiden evolved from a primarily print-based business directory to a digital-first platform, the brand identity needed to reflect this transformation. The existing visual language felt outdated and didn’t convey the modern, user-friendly digital experience the company was building.

Approach

Research & Discovery

  • Analyzed competitor positioning in the digital directory space
  • Interviewed stakeholders to understand business goals and user needs
  • Audited existing brand touchpoints (print magazine, website, marketing materials)

Brand Strategy
